Introduction

Min Ah is a retired South Korean singer. She used to be a member of the girl group ILUV. She terminated her contract with her agency and left the group in July 2020. Min Ah accused her former co-members of bullying and because of this, her former agency WKS ENE sued her. The agency eventually dropped the charges a year later. Currently, Min Ah is no longer a celebrity and is currently studying psychology.
